text: @FLOTUS Ha ideas of white supremacy & spreading COVID19 was all I saw and heard from last night’s “event”. Maybe you will break your record of 510 positive tests (Kim Gilfoyle is a good start) that you had after Tulsa sh-tshow. Start packing up Nov is coming!
